Usage Context: In this context, སེམས་ refers to the fundamental nature of consciousness
Here བདེ་བ་ denotes a state of contentment and joy
The term སྟོང་པ་ཉིད་ indicates the absence of inherent existence
ཤེས་རབ་ represents discriminating awareness and insight
In this passage, ཐུགས་རྗེ་ means loving-kindness and empathy
